title: 'Chaotic' British response left thousands of Afghans unable to flee the Taliban, whistleblower claims
content:
1. 'Chaotic' British response left thousands of Afghans unable to flee the Taliban, whistleblower claims  CNN
  2. Boris Johnson intervened to evacuate animal charity from Kabul, says whistleblower  BBC News
  3. WorldView: Whistleblower condemns U.K. evacuation of Afghanistan  CBS News
  4. Whistleblower: As Afghanistan fell, UK abandoned supporters  Associated Press
  5. Raab denies prioritising animals over humans during Afghanistan evacuation  Guardian News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 混乱した英国の対応により、何千人ものアフガニスタン人がタリバンから逃れることができなかったと内部告発者が主張
举报人称，"混乱的 "英国反应使成千上万的阿富汗人无法逃离塔利班
舉報人稱，"混亂的 "英國反應使成千上萬的阿富汗人無法逃離塔利班
